txt.en: 'If you happen to see Hardfang when you venture out, you must face him. The hunters of Galtrev have all tried and failed, and many who met him were borne home with mortal wounds.\n\n'A hunter of Galtrev must attempt to defeat Hardfang, for every battle weakens him.'

'You have done better than I expected! You are truly a remarkable warrior and hunter...better than any I have seen in my lifetime here in Galtrev. I am glad that you were not forced to join the war, [placeholder].'
'Beware of Hardfang! His bite is deep, and he is a cruel foe....'
The elusive Hardfang roams the Fanged Lair, striking terror into the hearts of all who dare face him.
Defeat Hardfang, leader of the wolves
The elusive Hardfang can often be found circling the Fanged Lair, north of Galtrev.\n\nYou should find and defeat Hardfang as part of the ritual wolf-hunt in Pren Gwydh.
Hopcun is in Galtrev.\n\nYou should tell Hopcun that you have faced and bested Hardfang during your hunt.
